short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyse your activity on amazon music online. Click on the badge to view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tracks music played on Amazon Music. Easily view the most played songs, albums and artists. Also provides the option to download all analytic data.
